title: Lots of loading... ugh
body:
Well my league hasnt been in tip top shape over the past few days and i have been experiencing quite a lot of lag. Due to this i have stopped playing ranked games and i have retreated to my smurf account. But when i tried to log in this morning it says that it needed an update and i just went with it and it loaded really slowly (it took 4 hours to get %20). After a good 6 hours of being bored around the house league decided to stop loading at %32 and sit there. I then had to close the launcher and start from square one and right now it has loaded 1%. I dunno, does anyone else? and is anyone else in Tasmania experiencing a lot of lag.
{{champion:134}} Syndra FTW

replies.body:
I got this a couple of times actually, turns out League doesn't like you having your DNS address being sought automatically. [Here's how to fix that,](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#jwq4) though keep in mind that it could stuff up other programs which connect to the internet.

I live just above Tassy and I can tell you, I'm not really getting any lag. The servers are fine atm.
